ROOT.QUERY:
WITH LASSTXWEEKS as ( SELECT TRUNC(TRUNC(sysdate) - LEVEL - 1) AS DT, to_char(TRUNC(TRUNC(sysdate) - LEVEL - 1),''MM/DD'') DT_DATE, to_char(TRUNC(TRUNC(sysdate) - LEVEL -1),''D'') DT_DAY, to_char(TRUNC(TRUNC(sysdate) - LEVEL - 1), ''IWRRRR'') wk FROM dual WHERE to_char(TRUNC(TRUNC(TRUNC(sysdate) - LEVEL - 1), ''iw''), ''RRRR'') = to_char(TRUNC(sysdate),''RRRR'') CONNECT BY LEVEL < TRUNC(sysdate) - TRUNC(NEXT_DAY(sysdate-28-to_number(to_char(sysdate-1,''D'')), ''MON''))), PI_NEG AS ( SELECT to_char(extract_date, ''MM/DD'') COUNTING_DATE, to_char(trunc(extract_date), ''IWRRRR'') WK, to_char(trunc(extract_date),''D'') COUNTING_DAY, SALE_LOAD, STORE_NUM, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_DESC, SUM (CASE WHEN QTY < 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) NEG_MORNING, SUM (CASE WHEN QTY = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ZERO_MORNING, SUM (CASE WHEN QTY < 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INVDETINV@Heinens_Custom_Prod, ARTRAC@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE DINSITE = STORE_NUM AND ARTCEXR = ITEM_CODE AND DINCINR = ARTCINR AND TRUNC(DINDCRE) = TRUNC(EXTRACT_DATE)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) NEG_EVENING, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT stmcinl) OTHER_CYCLE FROM stomvt@Heinens_Custom_Prod, STRUCTURE@Heinens_Custom_Prod, artvl@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE STORE_NUM=stmsite AND stmtmvt=125 AND TRUNC(stmdmvt)=TRUNC(extract_date) AND stmseqvl=arlseqvl /* belong to this departemet */ AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN strddeb AND strdfin AND strcint=pkstrucrel.GET_CINT_PERE@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1,''1'',arlcinr, TRUNC(SYSDATE)) AND DEPT_CODE=pkstrucobj.get_cext@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1,strpere) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM heinens_neg_inventory@Heinens_Custom_Prod other WHERE other.item_code=arlcexr AND stmseqvl=arlseqvl AND other.store_num=neg_inv.store_num AND other.extract_date=neg_inv.extract_date)) OTHER_CYCLE FROM heinens_neg_inventory@Heinens_Custom_Prod neg_inv WHERE TRUNC(EXTRACT_DATE) >= (SELECT MIN(DT) FROM LASSTXWEEKS) AND STORE_NUM=:param2 /* Exclude Food Services - Only Dairy/Grocery */ AND DEPT_CODE in (''1020000000000'', ''1030000000000'') GROUP BY extract_date, store_num, dept_code, dept_desc, sale_load ORDER BY extract_date, store_num ASC, dept_code ASC), PI_NEG_WK AS ( SELECT DISTINCT WK, STORE_NUM, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_DESC, SALE_LOAD FROM PI_NEG), PI_NEG_PERC AS ( SELECT STORE_NUM, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_DESC, WK, COUNTING_DATE, COUNTING_DAY, NEG_MORNING, NEG_EVENING, DECODE(SALE_LOAD,0, ''N/A'', DECODE (NEG_MORNING,0, ''100%'', ROUND(100* (1-NEG_EVENING / NEG_MORNING),2)) || ''%'') NEG_SALEFAIL_COVERED, DECODE (NEG_MORNING,0, ''100%'', ROUND(100* (1-NEG_EVENING / NEG_MORNING),2)) || ''%'' NEG_COVERED, ZERO_MORNING, OTHER_CYCLE FROM PI_NEG), RESULT AS ( /* Separator */ SELECT STORE_NUM, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_DESC, ''-----'' INFO, ''-----'' WK, ''-----'' MONDAY, ''-----'' TUESDAY, ''-----'' WEDNESDAY, ''-----'' THURSDAY, ''-----'' FRIDAY, ''-----'' SATURDAY, ''-----'' SUNDAY FROM PI_NEG_WK WK UNION /* week days */ SELECT STORE_NUM, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_DESC, ''# Week days'' INFO, WK.WK, NVL((SELECT COUNTING_DATE FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''2''), (SELECT DT_DATE FROM LASSTXWEEKS lw WHERE WK.WK=lw.WK AND lw.DT_DAY=''2'')) MONDAY, NVL((SELECT COUNTING_DATE FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''3''), (SELECT DT_DATE FROM LASSTXWEEKS lw WHERE WK.WK=lw.WK AND lw.DT_DAY=''3'')) TUESDAY, NVL((SELECT COUNTING_DATE FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''4''), (SELECT DT_DATE FROM LASSTXWEEKS lw WHERE WK.WK=lw.WK AND lw.DT_DAY=''4'')) WEDNESDAY, NVL((SELECT COUNTING_DATE FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''5''), (SELECT DT_DATE FROM LASSTXWEEKS lw WHERE WK.WK=lw.WK AND lw.DT_DAY=''5'')) THURSDAY, NVL((SELECT COUNTING_DATE FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''6''), (SELECT DT_DATE FROM LASSTXWEEKS lw WHERE WK.WK=lw.WK AND lw.DT_DAY=''6'')) FRIDAY, NVL((SELECT COUNTING_DATE FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''7''), (SELECT DT_DATE FROM LASSTXWEEKS lw WHERE WK.WK=lw.WK AND lw.DT_DAY=''7'')) SATURDAY, NVL((SELECT COUNTING_DATE FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''1''), (SELECT DT_DATE FROM LASSTXWEEKS lw WHERE WK.WK=lw.WK AND lw.DT_DAY=''1'')) SUNDAY FROM PI_NEG_WK WK UNION /* Negative Morning reported */ SELECT STORE_NUM, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_DESC, ''#1 Negative inventory'' INFO, WK.WK, (SELECT to_char(NEG_MORNING) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''2'') MONDAY, (SELECT to_char(NEG_MORNING) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''3'') TUESDAY, (SELECT to_char(NEG_MORNING) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''4'') WEDNESDAY, (SELECT to_char(NEG_MORNING) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''5'') THURSDAY, (SELECT to_char(NEG_MORNING) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''6'') FRIDAY, (SELECT to_char(NEG_MORNING) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''7'') SATURDAY, (SELECT to_char(NEG_MORNING) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''1'') SUNDAY FROM PI_NEG_WK WK UNION /* Zero reported */ SELECT STORE_NUM, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_DESC, ''#2 Zero inventory'' INFO, WK.WK, (SELECT to_char(ZERO_MORNING) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''2'') MONDAY, (SELECT to_char(ZERO_MORNING) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''3'') TUESDAY, (SELECT to_char(ZERO_MORNING) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''4'') WEDNESDAY, (SELECT to_char(ZERO_MORNING) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''5'') THURSDAY, (SELECT to_char(ZERO_MORNING) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''6'') FRIDAY, (SELECT to_char(ZERO_MORNING) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''7'') SATURDAY, (SELECT to_char(ZERO_MORNING) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''1'') SUNDAY FROM PI_NEG_WK WK UNION /* Other Cycled */ SELECT STORE_NUM, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_DESC, ''#3 Other cycled'' INFO, WK.WK, (SELECT to_char(OTHER_CYCLE) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''2'') MONDAY, (SELECT to_char(OTHER_CYCLE) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''3'') TUESDAY, (SELECT to_char(OTHER_CYCLE) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''4'') WEDNESDAY, (SELECT to_char(OTHER_CYCLE) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''5'') THURSDAY, (SELECT to_char(OTHER_CYCLE) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''6'') FRIDAY, (SELECT to_char(OTHER_CYCLE) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''7'') SATURDAY, (SELECT to_char(OTHER_CYCLE) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''1'') SUNDAY FROM PI_NEG_WK WK UNION
/* Negative Fixed */ SELECT STORE_NUM, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_DESC, ''#4 Negative Fixed'' INFO, WK.WK, (SELECT to_char(NEG_COVERED) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''2'') MONDAY, (SELECT to_char(NEG_COVERED) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''3'') TUESDAY, (SELECT to_char(NEG_COVERED) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''4'') WEDNESDAY, (SELECT to_char(NEG_COVERED) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''5'') THURSDAY, (SELECT to_char(NEG_COVERED) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''6'') FRIDAY, (SELECT to_char(NEG_COVERED) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''7'') SATURDAY, (SELECT to_char(NEG_COVERED) FROM PI_NEG_PERC pneg_perc WHERE pneg_perc.WK=wk.WK AND pneg_perc.STORE_NUM=wk.STORE_NUM AND pneg_perc.DEPT_CODE=wk.DEPT_CODE AND pneg_perc.COUNTING_DAY=''1'') SUNDAY FROM PI_NEG_WK WK) SELECT * FROM RESULT ORDER BY STORE_NUM, DEPT_CODE ASC, REPLACE(WK, ''-'',''9'') DESC, INFO ASC
ROOT.HEADER: FLASH REPORT - Daily Stores Neg. Inventory Activity
